verbose_text: Additionally, intraplanar injection of formalin has been described to induce the production and release of NO [XREF_BIBR], which in turn is suggested to be an essential component of the proinflammatory / nociceptive response by the stimulation of the production and release of cytokines, reactive species, and prostanoids [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: formalin has been described to induce the production and release of NO
